CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Subject="Breakdown Appointment", FSL__Related_Service__c <> null ), IF(NOT(ISBLANK(FSL__Related_Service__r.Landmark__c)), FSL__Related_Service__r.Landmark__c & ", ", NULL ) & FSL__Related_Service__r.Street & ", " & FSL__Related_Service__r.City & ", " & FSL__Related_Service__r.State & ", " & FSL__Related_Service__r.PostalCode , NULL )
CustomField.label: Tow Destination
